Reviews.Title: best camera for traveling
Reviews.Author: Carolyn T. Millender "sammy"
Reviews.Content: Every year i travel out of the country,and i take my big canon. my friend had this samsung w250 it took . the best pictures, small and easy to handle. i will never buy another big difficult  to work and hard to manage camera again.and by the way very expensive.

ProductInfo.Features:
Share your photos instantly with built-in wi-Fi
24mm wide angle and powerful 18x optical zoom
14M BSI CMOS Sensor & Low Light Settings
1920x1080 Full HD video with life-like color and extraordinarily sharp details.
3.0" (75mm) hVGA Hybrid Touch User Interface
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB250F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Red)Premium kit with a 16GB card, Lithium ion battery, Digpro case and a cleaning kit.
